creditline: Lent by The Wang Xing Lou Collection
description: white glazed soft-paste porcelain archaistic Hu-form vase; stylized elephant handles with attached rings at shoulders, cloud design band at top; stylized animals in larger band about body; has own storage box
medium: Soft-paste porcelain with a white glaze over carved decoration
text: Following the form of an ancient bronze <I>hu<I>, this vessel is made from a special type of porcelain called "soft paste," which is characterized by its light weight, relative opacity, creamy color, and irregularly crackled glaze. Ironically, Chinese soft-paste porcelain is anything but soft. It is so hard, it cannot even be scratched with a steel knife.
title: Soft-Paste Vase with Carved Archaistic Designs
